variables.sqlPoolConnection: [concat('Integrated Security=False;Encrypt=True;Connection Timeout=30;Data Source=', parameters('workspaceName'), '.sql.azuresynapse.net;Initial Catalog=', parameters('sqlPoolName'))]

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		value as (WorkItemId as string, InProgressDate as string, CompletedDate as string, LeadTimeDays as double, CycleTimeDays as double, InProgressDateSK as string, CompletedDateSK as string, AnalyticsUpdatedDate as string, ProjectSK as string, WorkItemRevisionSK as string, AreaSK as string, IterationSK as string, AssignedToUserSK as string, ChangedByUserSK as string, CreatedByUserSK as string, ActivatedByUserSK as string, ClosedByUserSK as string, ResolvedByUserSK as string, ActivatedDateSK as string, ChangedDateSK as string, ClosedDateSK as string, CreatedDateSK as string, ResolvedDateSK as string, StateChangeDateSK as string, Revision as string, Watermark as string, Title as string, WorkItemType as string, ChangedDate as string, CreatedDate as string, State as string, Reason as string, FoundIn as string, IntegrationBuild as string, ActivatedDate as string, Activity as string, BusinessValue as string, ClosedDate as string, Issue as string, Priority as string, Rating as string, ResolvedDate as string, ResolvedReason as string, Risk as string, Severity as string, StackRank as string, TimeCriticality as string, ValueArea as string, CompletedWork as string, DueDate as string, Effort as string, FinishDate as string, OriginalEstimate as string, RemainingWork as string, StartDate as string, StoryPoints as string, TargetDate as string, ParentWorkItemId as string, TagNames as string, StateCategory as string, AutomatedTestId as string, AutomatedTestName as string, AutomatedTestStorage as string, AutomatedTestType as string, AutomationStatus as string, StateChangeDate as string, Count as string, CommentCount as string, Microsoft_VSTS_CodeReview_AcceptedBySK as string, Microsoft_VSTS_CodeReview_AcceptedDate as string, Microsoft_VSTS_CodeReview_ClosedStatus as string, Microsoft_VSTS_CodeReview_ClosedStatusCode as string, Microsoft_VSTS_CodeReview_ClosingComment as string, Microsoft_VSTS_CodeReview_Context as string, Microsoft_VSTS_CodeReview_ContextCode as string, Microsoft_VSTS_CodeReview_ContextOwner as string, Microsoft_VSTS_CodeReview_ContextType as string, Microsoft_VSTS_Common_ReviewedBySK as string, Microsoft_VSTS_Common_StateCode as string, Microsoft_VSTS_Feedback_ApplicationType as string, Microsoft_VSTS_TCM_TestSuiteType as string, Microsoft_VSTS_TCM_TestSuiteTypeId as string)[]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> ADOBugsJson
source(output(
		value as (WorkItemId as string, InProgressDate as string, CompletedDate as string, LeadTimeDays as double, CycleTimeDays as double, InProgressDateSK as string, CompletedDateSK as string, AnalyticsUpdatedDate as string, ProjectSK as string, WorkItemRevisionSK as string, AreaSK as string, IterationSK as string, AssignedToUserSK as string, ChangedByUserSK as string, CreatedByUserSK as string, ActivatedByUserSK as string, ClosedByUserSK as string, ResolvedByUserSK as string, ActivatedDateSK as string, ChangedDateSK as string, ClosedDateSK as string, CreatedDateSK as string, ResolvedDateSK as string, StateChangeDateSK as string, Revision as string, Watermark as string, Title as string, WorkItemType as string, ChangedDate as string, CreatedDate as string, State as string, Reason as string, FoundIn as string, IntegrationBuild as string, ActivatedDate as string, Activity as string, BusinessValue as string, ClosedDate as string, Issue as string, Priority as string, Rating as string, ResolvedDate as string, ResolvedReason as string, Risk as string, Severity as string, StackRank as string, TimeCriticality as string, ValueArea as string, CompletedWork as string, DueDate as string, Effort as string, FinishDate as string, OriginalEstimate as string, RemainingWork as string, StartDate as string, StoryPoints as string, TargetDate as string, ParentWorkItemId as string, TagNames as string, StateCategory as string, AutomatedTestId as string, AutomatedTestName as string, AutomatedTestStorage as string, AutomatedTestType as string, AutomationStatus as string, StateChangeDate as string, Count as string, CommentCount as string, Microsoft_VSTS_CodeReview_AcceptedBySK as string, Microsoft_VSTS_CodeReview_AcceptedDate as string, Microsoft_VSTS_CodeReview_ClosedStatus as string, Microsoft_VSTS_CodeReview_ClosedStatusCode as string, Microsoft_VSTS_CodeReview_ClosingComment as string, Microsoft_VSTS_CodeReview_Context as string, Microsoft_VSTS_CodeReview_ContextCode as string, Microsoft_VSTS_CodeReview_ContextOwner as string, Microsoft_VSTS_CodeReview_ContextType as string, Microsoft_VSTS_Common_ReviewedBySK as string, Microsoft_VSTS_Common_StateCode as string, Microsoft_VSTS_Feedback_ApplicationType as string, Microsoft_VSTS_TCM_TestSuiteType as string, Microsoft_VSTS_TCM_TestSuiteTypeId as string)[]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> ADOTasksJsonData
source(output(
		value as (WorkItemId as string, InProgressDate as string, CompletedDate as string, LeadTimeDays as double, CycleTimeDays as double, InProgressDateSK as string, CompletedDateSK as string, AnalyticsUpdatedDate as string, ProjectSK as string, WorkItemRevisionSK as string, AreaSK as string, IterationSK as string, AssignedToUserSK as string, ChangedByUserSK as string, CreatedByUserSK as string, ActivatedByUserSK as string, ClosedByUserSK as string, ResolvedByUserSK as string, ActivatedDateSK as string, ChangedDateSK as string, ClosedDateSK as string, CreatedDateSK as string, ResolvedDateSK as string, StateChangeDateSK as string, Revision as string, Watermark as string, Title as string, WorkItemType as string, ChangedDate as string, CreatedDate as string, State as string, Reason as string, FoundIn as string, IntegrationBuild as string, ActivatedDate as string, Activity as string, BusinessValue as string, ClosedDate as string, Issue as string, Priority as string, Rating as string, ResolvedDate as string, ResolvedReason as string, Risk as string, Severity as string, StackRank as string, TimeCriticality as string, ValueArea as string, CompletedWork as string, DueDate as string, Effort as string, FinishDate as string, OriginalEstimate as string, RemainingWork as string, StartDate as string, StoryPoints as string, TargetDate as string, ParentWorkItemId as string, TagNames as string, StateCategory as string, AutomatedTestId as string, AutomatedTestName as string, AutomatedTestStorage as string, AutomatedTestType as string, AutomationStatus as string, StateChangeDate as string, Count as string, CommentCount as string, Microsoft_VSTS_CodeReview_AcceptedBySK as string, Microsoft_VSTS_CodeReview_AcceptedDate as string, Microsoft_VSTS_CodeReview_ClosedStatus as string, Microsoft_VSTS_CodeReview_ClosedStatusCode as string, Microsoft_VSTS_CodeReview_ClosingComment as string, Microsoft_VSTS_CodeReview_Context as string, Microsoft_VSTS_CodeReview_ContextCode as string, Microsoft_VSTS_CodeReview_ContextOwner as string, Microsoft_VSTS_CodeReview_ContextType as string, Microsoft_VSTS_Common_ReviewedBySK as string, Microsoft_VSTS_Common_StateCode as string, Microsoft_VSTS_Feedback_ApplicationType as string, Microsoft_VSTS_TCM_TestSuiteType as string, Microsoft_VSTS_TCM_TestSuiteTypeId as string)[]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> ADOFeaturesJsonData
source(output(
		value as (WorkItemId as string, InProgressDate as string, CompletedDate as string, LeadTimeDays as double, CycleTimeDays as double, InProgressDateSK as string, CompletedDateSK as string, AnalyticsUpdatedDate as string, ProjectSK as string, WorkItemRevisionSK as string, AreaSK as string, IterationSK as string, AssignedToUserSK as string, ChangedByUserSK as string, CreatedByUserSK as string, ActivatedByUserSK as string, ClosedByUserSK as string, ResolvedByUserSK as string, ActivatedDateSK as string, ChangedDateSK as string, ClosedDateSK as string, CreatedDateSK as string, ResolvedDateSK as string, StateChangeDateSK as string, Revision as string, Watermark as string, Title as string, WorkItemType as string, ChangedDate as string, CreatedDate as string, State as string, Reason as string, FoundIn as string, IntegrationBuild as string, ActivatedDate as string, Activity as string, BusinessValue as string, ClosedDate as string, Issue as string, Priority as string, Rating as string, ResolvedDate as string, ResolvedReason as string, Risk as string, Severity as string, StackRank as string, TimeCriticality as string, ValueArea as string, CompletedWork as string, DueDate as string, Effort as string, FinishDate as string, OriginalEstimate as string, RemainingWork as string, StartDate as string, StoryPoints as string, TargetDate as string, ParentWorkItemId as string, TagNames as string, StateCategory as string, AutomatedTestId as string, AutomatedTestName as string, AutomatedTestStorage as string, AutomatedTestType as string, AutomationStatus as string, StateChangeDate as string, Count as string, CommentCount as string, Microsoft_VSTS_CodeReview_AcceptedBySK as string, Microsoft_VSTS_CodeReview_AcceptedDate as string, Microsoft_VSTS_CodeReview_ClosedStatus as string, Microsoft_VSTS_CodeReview_ClosedStatusCode as string, Microsoft_VSTS_CodeReview_ClosingComment as string, Microsoft_VSTS_CodeReview_Context as string, Microsoft_VSTS_CodeReview_ContextCode as string, Microsoft_VSTS_CodeReview_ContextOwner as string, Microsoft_VSTS_CodeReview_ContextType as string, Microsoft_VSTS_Common_ReviewedBySK as string, Microsoft_VSTS_Common_StateCode as string, Microsoft_VSTS_Feedback_ApplicationType as string, Microsoft_VSTS_TCM_TestSuiteType as string, Microsoft_VSTS_TCM_TestSuiteTypeId as string)[]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> ADOUserStoryJsonData
source(output(
		value as (commitId as string, author as (name as string, email as string, date as string), committer as (name as string, email as string, date as string), comment as string, changeCounts as (Add as string, Edit as string, Delete as string), url as string, remoteUrl as string)[]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> ADOGitJsonData
source(output(
		value as (UserSK as string, UserId as string, UserName as string, UserEmail as string, AnalyticsUpdatedDate as string, GitHubUserId as string, UserType as string)[]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> ADOUserData
source(output(
		ActivityId as integer,
		ActivityName as string,
		ActivityDescription as string,
		ActivityTypeId as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> ActivityData
source(output(
		EmployeeId as integer,
		WPAEmployeeId as string,
		WPAEmployeeName as string,
		EmployeeHireDate as timestamp,
		Organization as string,
		LevelDesignation as string,
		FunctionType as string,
		Region as string,
		Layer as string,
		IsInternal as string,
		SupervisorIndicator as string,
		Number_of_directs as string,
		ADOUserSK as string,
		ADOUserId as string,
		ADOUserEmail as string,
		ADOUserName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> EmployeeData
source(output(
		EmployeeId as integer,
		ActivityId as integer,
		Date as date,
		DateKey as integer,
		ActivityValue as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> EmployeeActvityData
ADOBugsJson foldDown(unroll(value),
	mapColumn(
		AssignedToUserSK = value.AssignedToUserSK,
		ActivatedDate = value.ActivatedDate,
		Bug_Count = value.Count
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flattenthevauearray
ADOTasksJsonData foldDown(unroll(value),
	mapColumn(
		AssignedToUserSK = value.AssignedToUserSK,
		ActivatedDate = value.ActivatedDate,
		Task_Count = value.Count
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlattenTheTaskValueArray
ADOFeaturesJsonData foldDown(unroll(value),
	mapColumn(
		AssignedToUserSK = value.AssignedToUserSK,
		ActivatedDate = value.ActivatedDate,
		Feature_Count = value.Count
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlattenTheFeatureValueArray
ADOUserStoryJsonData foldDown(unroll(value),
	mapColumn(
		AssignedToUserSK = value.AssignedToUserSK,
		ActivatedDate = value.ActivatedDate,
		User_Story_Story_Points = value.StoryPoints,
		User_Story_Count = value.Count
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlattenTheUserStoryValueArray
ConvertActivatedDateToDate unpivot(output(
		ActivityDesc as string,
		{ ActivityValue} as string
	),
	ungroupBy(AssignedToUserSK,
		ActivatedDate),
	lateral: false,
	ignoreNullPivots: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> UnpivotBugs
ADOGitJsonData foldDown(unroll(value),
	mapColumn(
		commitId = value.commitId,
		email = value.committer.email,
		date = value.committer.date,
		Git_Commit_Add = value.changeCounts.Add,
		Git_Commit_Edit = value.changeCounts.Edit,
		Git_Commit_Delete = value.changeCounts.Delete
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlattenTGeGItJson
ADOUserData foldDown(unroll(value),
	mapColumn(
		UserSK = value.UserSK,
		UserId = value.UserId,
		UserName = value.UserName,
		UserEmail = value.UserEmail
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FLattenTheADOUserJsonData
FlattenTGeGItJson, FLattenTheADOUserJsonData join(email == UserEmail,
	joinType:'inner',
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		AssignedToUserSK = UserSK,
		ActivatedDate = date,
		Git_Commit_Add,
		Git_Commit_Edit,
		Git_Commit_Delete
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
ConvertTheGItActivatedDateToDate unpivot(output(
		ActivityDesc as string,
		AcivityValue as string
	),
	ungroupBy(AssignedToUserSK,
		ActivatedDate),
	lateral: false,
	ignoreNullPivots: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> UnpivotGitData
ConvertActivateDateToDate unpivot(output(
		ActivityDesc as string,
		ActivityValue as string
	),
	ungroupBy(AssignedToUserSK,
		ActivatedDate),
	lateral: false,
	ignoreNullPivots: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> UnpivotTasks
ConvertFeatureActivateDateToDate unpivot(output(
		ActivityDesc as string,
		ActivityValue as string
	),
	ungroupBy(AssignedToUserSK,
		ActivatedDate),
	lateral: false,
	ignoreNullPivots: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> UnpivotFeatures
ConvertUserStoryActivatedDateToDate unpivot(output(
		ActivityDesc as string,
		ActivityValue as string
	),
	ungroupBy(AssignedToUserSK,
		ActivatedDate),
	lateral: false,
	ignoreNullPivots: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> UnpivotUserStory
AggregateTheActivityValueForFeatures, AggregateTheActivityValueForGit, AggregateTheActivityValueForBugs, AggregateTheActivityValueForTasks, AggregateTheActivityValueForUserStory union(byName: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1))~> CombineAllWorkItems
CombineAllWorkItems filter(not(isNull(AssignedToUserSK)) && not(isNull(ActivatedDate)),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> FilterOutAlltheNullValues
FilterOutAlltheNullValues derive(DateKey = toInteger(replace(toString(ActivatedDate),'-','')),
		ActivityValue = toInteger(ActivityValue)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1, ActivityData join(ActivityDesc == ActivityName,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ExtractActivityID
ExtractActivityID select(mapColumn(
		AssignedToUserSK,
		ActivityId,
		DateKey,
		ActivityValue,
		Date = ActivatedDate
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectWIthActivityID
EmployeeData select(mapColumn(
		EmployeeId,
		ADOUserSK
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectEmployeeIDAndUserSK
SelectWIthActivityID, SelectEmployeeIDAndUserSK join(AssignedToUserSK == ADOUserSK,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinWithEmployee
JoinWithEmployee select(mapColumn(
		EmployeeId,
		ActivityId,
		Date,
		DateKey,
		ActivityValue
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectTheRequiredColumns
Sort1, EmployeeActvityData exists(SelectTheRequiredColumns@EmployeeId == EmployeeActvityData@EmployeeId
	&& SelectTheRequiredColumns@DateKey == EmployeeActvityData@DateKey
	&& SelectTheRequiredColumns@ActivityId == EmployeeActvityData@ActivityId
	&& SelectTheRequiredColumns@ActivityValue == EmployeeActvityData@ActivityValue,
	negate:true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> UpdatetheEmplyeeActivityTable
SelectTheRequiredColumns sort(asc(EmployeeId, true),
	asc(ActivityId, true),
	asc(DateKey, true),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> Sort1
UnpivotBugs aggregate(groupBy(AssignedToUserSK,
		ActivatedDate,
		ActivityDesc),
	{ ActivityValue} = sum(toInteger({ ActivityValue})),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> AggregateTheActivityValueForBugs
UpdatetheEmplyeeActivityTable alterRow(upsertIf(ActivityValue>=1)) ~> AlterRow1
UnpivotTasks aggregate(groupBy(AssignedToUserSK,
		ActivatedDate,
		ActivityDesc),
	ActivityValue = sum(toInteger(ActivityValue))) ~> AggregateTheActivityValueForTasks
UnpivotFeatures aggregate(groupBy(AssignedToUserSK,
		ActivatedDate,
		ActivityDesc),
	ActivityValue = sum(toInteger(ActivityValue))) ~> AggregateTheActivityValueForFeatures
UnpivotUserStory aggregate(groupBy(AssignedToUserSK,
		ActivatedDate,
		ActivityDesc),
	ActivityValue = sum(toInteger(ActivityValue))) ~> AggregateTheActivityValueForUserStory
UnpivotGitData aggregate(groupBy(AssignedToUserSK,
		ActivatedDate,
		ActivityDesc),
	AcivityValue = sum(toInteger(AcivityValue))) ~> AggregateTheActivityValueForGit
Flattenthevauearray derive(ActivatedDate = toDate(ActivatedDate,'yyyy-MM-dd')) ~> ConvertActivatedDateToDate
FlattenTheTaskValueArray derive(ActivatedDate = toDate(ActivatedDate,'yyyy-MM-dd')) ~> ConvertActivateDateToDate
FlattenTheFeatureValueArray derive(ActivatedDate = toDate(ActivatedDate,'yyyy-MM-dd')) ~> ConvertFeatureActivateDateToDate
FlattenTheUserStoryValueArray derive(ActivatedDate = toDate(ActivatedDate,'yyyy-MM-dd')) ~> ConvertUserStoryActivatedDateToDate
Select1 derive(ActivatedDate = toDate(ActivatedDate,'yyyy-MM-dd')) ~> ConvertTheGItActivatedDateToDate
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		EmployeeId as integer,
		ActivityId as integer,
		Date as date,
		DateKey as integer,
		ActivityValue as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['EmployeeId','ActivityId','DateKey'],
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> UpdateValuesToEmployeeActivtyTable
